summary: A tenacious scientist blasts off for the moon in hopes of riches that may be found there.
cast: Willy Fritsch|Gerda Maurus|Klaus Pohl|Fritz Rasp|Gustl Gstettenbaur|Gustav von Wangenheim|Tilla Durieux|Margarete Kupfer|Alexa von Porembsky|Heinrich Gotho|Alfred Loretto|Max Maximilian|Edgar Pauly|Karl Platen|Gerhard Dammann|Mahmud Terja Bey|Hermann Vallentin|Borwin Walth|Max Zilzer|Die Maus Josephine|Julius E. Herrmann
title: La mujer en la luna
